topics.body:
the thing that makes madvillainy so awesome is how abstract it is.

trought the whole album, there isnt even 1, NOT A SINGLE, chorus, couple that with the fact most songs are 1 - 2 minute long, and mf doomÂ´s weird flow, its such an abstract album, like it was suppose to be made to NOT play on radios.

seriously 1 minute long songs and no choruses, and lots of skits it felt weird at first
